title: What can schools do to nurture children’s problem solving abilities? - Quora

response.answer_text: Experience: Important experiences help children learn to value different kinds of thinking, think logically and creatively, and take an active role in their world.Creative Thinking:This Might involve seeing a different way to do something, generating new ideas, or using materials in unique ways. Let Children try out difficult stuffs,take risk, experiment and also make mistakes.Brainstorm: Invite children to be fluent thinkers by asking them to respond to questions that have many right answers.Critical Thinking: It is the ability to mentally break down a problem or an idea into parts and analyze them. Let them sort,compare and classify the differences and similarities.Provide plenty of time every day for children to choose activities based on their interests and developmental levels.
